name: Tattoo Design Master 3D
description:
A new Tattoo Design Master is in town with his fashion studio and that is you. Become an artist this Christmas by designing 3D tattoo on your customers. Tattoo maker is nothing less than art and everyone knows it. Customers are lining up outside your fashion makeover studio.

OXO Games Studio brings you another mesmerizing, breathtaking and beautiful experience of tattoo designing to your phone. Draw amazing floral, tribal, dragon or fantasy tattoo’s all in one place. Learn the ways of a master artist with ease.

FEATURES:
• Beautifully simulated 3D Tattoo designing
• A wide range of tattoos to select from like floral, dragon, tribal or fantasy
• Perform cleaning of body parts before drawing your art
• Easy to play but hard to be a master artist
• Draw what suits your fashion
• A special Christmas Edition
• Smooth and easy controls
• A real-like 3D Tattoo Studio environment
• Breathtaking HD Graphics and Art Designs
• Free to play forever
• Calming music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:
- OXO 3D Studio Website: http://oxoapps.com
- Join our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/oxo3d
- OXO 3D Studio on Twitter: @Oxo3d

WE LOVE TO HEAR:
* If you like this Tattoo Design Master 3D, then Rate and Review and if something went wicked or you have any recommendation then please give your valued feedback at mailto:3d@oxoapps.com.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR CUSTOMERS:
* This is free game especially for Tattoo, Art, Fashion and Simulation game lovers but it contains third party ads.
